title: Lost My Ranked Rewards
body:
I was in Gold 4 and was given Gold 1 rewards.  Played with my ranked rewards for 2 weeks before I lost then, have tried to contact a rioter many times but none have messaged me back. Someone help me with this Issue

_**Nudes Or GTFO**_

replies.body:
Hi,

What methods did you use to try and get in touch?  Did you send in a support ticket?

The most likely cause for you to not receive your rewards was due to the reasons mentioned by Deep Terror Nami - if you missed out due to not meeting eligibility requirements.

That said - if you feel you did not receive them in error, you should get in touch with support!

Cheers,
Mindstar
I have emailed Riot's oce email and i have also added many rioters on lol, I have messaged the oce fb page. No one has messaged me back

The best way to get one-on-one support is to go to the Player Support team directly by [submitting a request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  This makes sure that your question goes through the proper channels and will be answered.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey Nudes or GTFO,

Have you received any chat or account bans recently (between Aug. 10th and now)? There are a few ways to become ineligible or lose your rewards, so let's rule those out first. If we can confirm you didn't lose them for those reasons you should submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Let me know as soon as you can.

-DTN
I haven't been ban for 6 months but i don't know about being reported

Simply being reported doesn't matter. If you had a chat restriction **when the rewards were distributed**, had a ban **up to 3 months prior to the end of the season (Aug 10th - Nov 11th)**, or received an MMR Boosting ban **at any time during or after the season**, then you will have been ineligible.

If you're not exactly sure if a punishment overlapped with those times to make you ineligible, submit that support ticket; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
